Title: Dark Descension
Description:
What are these void spawn doing here? Could it be the Harbinger's doing? Some power of the Dark Heart?

Well. I do not mean to stand idly by.

We must confront the Riftwalker. I don't think she will see reason now, but perhaps she can tell us something.
PortraitGiverText: Nilara has looked up to the Windrunner sisters her entire life. It was the honor of a lifetime to be able to work alongside Alleria.
